subject: Problem with ticket
description_text:
Hello, regarding the issue I talk about in the original message, a ticket
was created with the following link:
https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/7134?follow=email

After a couple hours of its creation the link wast not longer working. Also
I did not get any answer in almost 48h.

Please help me solve this issue with the delivery.

Regards,
Ignacio.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
De: warrendongo5 <warrendongo5.lol@gmail.com>
Date: lun, 1 dic 2025, 8:34
Subject: Delivery issue with order #SSN3827
To: <service@simsonn.com>


Hello,
I have a problem with the order #SSN3827. There has been a problem with the
delivery, stating that the packet was oversize\overweight and it has been
resended to you (I guess). I have atached two screenshots from the delivery
service website, where states this problem and the new waybill number,
confirming that the packet has been received (by you i guess).

Old waybill: SF6047082678264

New waybill: SF3295212713544

All of this without any update in the simsonn website.

I hope you can solve this as soon as possible.

Regards,
Ignacio.
